title: Good Samaritan  95124
map_address: 4787 Hatfield Way Unit #1, San Jose, California 95124 near Samaritan
street_address: 4787 Hatfield Way Unit #1, San Jose, California 95124
posting_body: Located in a best an quiet location of the complex, Ground floor unit, 2 bedroom with 1 bath.
Newly Remodeled bath, new paint, new dishwasher, ceiling fan, central A/C and heating.
Property features a large one car garage and with lockable storage and additional assigned parking spaces.
Dual pane windows throughout, inside washer and dryer.
This is a fabulous location that is close to Los Gatos, Parks, Restaurants, Coffee Shops and walking distance to Good Sam Hospital.
Water and Garbage is included in the rent.
